Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Includes keyboard, competitive performance, attractive, responsive screen, upgraded to Android 4.0 OS
Cons: Fewer apps than the iPad, keyboard adds bulk and weight, no touchpad on keyboard, pricey compared to Eee Pad Transformer
The Asus Eee Pad Slider is basically the highly regarded Asus Eee Pad Transformer , but with the Transformer's optional keyboard attached in slide-out form. Most of the pluses and minuses from that slate also apply to this one: The 1,280-by-800 IPS touchscreen is responsive and snappy, although things can falter when using the on-screen virtual keyboard. ...

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: Move over ipad, Eee is here!
Item.Review:
Pros: Operating System; App Availablity; WiFi; Battery Life; Screen; Easy To Customize; Web Browsing
This tablet is wonderful. I use it like a computer and it does everything I ask it to do. I am not computer savvy and my son pointed me to the Asus Eee and I am glad he did. I looked at the ipad but for the money the Eee is the better buy. As for certain comments about the sound quality I have found that using headphones takes care of this. I play games, surf the web, send emails and my favorite pasttime reading. I have had my tablet for about 3 weeks and have read 11 books so far. I have yet to find anything my Asus Eee can't do. Don't waste your money on an ipad. Remember once you get their tablet the keyboard is extra by about a $100.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Price, keyboard, portability, Adroid OS
Cons: No delete key, mediocre camera
I bought this in early October to replace a netbook. I wanted a tablet, but wanted a keyboard because I didn't like virtual keyboards. The ASUS lived up to all the hype and my expectations. My desktop sits idle and the ASUS goes everywhere. The surprise is how little I use the slide out keyboard. I have learned to use and enjoy the touch screen far more than I thought I would. The keyboard is slick, didn't take long to adapt to its size and my only complaint is the lack of a delete key. Moving to the Android OS required some effort, but the online forums helped whenever I was stumped. I have not had any trouble with the amount of battery time, but I don't tax it much with videos and music. Ther ... e are plenty of apps and I like the use of five home screens. I have not been able to get the Directv app or the NFL app to work. Online complaints helpe me realize that I am not alone. I think this unit is superior to other tablets that offer docking keyboards. Consumer Reports critiizes its weight, but that has not bothered me. I opted for the 16g version and bought a 32g memory card. That saved $75, but I have not come close to needing the extra storage. The screen is bright and very readable, and the gorilla glass has not scratched. Fingerprints were annoying at first, but now I don't notice. The camera is adequate but I have been somewhat disappointed by the quality of pictures. They seem a little bright and washed out. All in all I am very satisfied. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I have had the Slider for over a week now and I can hardly get it out of my wifes hands. Since it uses the Android operating system and we have android phones it was very easy to pick up and use. It was nice not to have an operating manusl the size of a dictionary to wade through. The office programs are easy to use and are similar to Micro Softs programs. I loaded a Bible app. and have it read while I am exercising, (multitasking is great). The battery life is as advertised and is great. zit hooked up to Verisons Mifi with no problem,(wish I had unlimmited data). The only complaint is that when you use the browser it kept going to the Asus web sights. It was alittle trying to get another home page to take over but I was able to get to and use AOL pop up as the home page. No big deal.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: Unbeatable for productive people on the go.
Item.Review:
Pros: Keyboard, speed, weight, features, versitility
Cons: Nothing!
I recently got the Asus Slider and I couldn't be happier with it. For people who need a device to do actual work on, this is the best tablet to consider. While it may be heavier and thicker than "traditional" tablets, keep in mind that you get an actual keyboard on it. Comparing it to a tablet with no decent input is ridiculous. Even if you're thinking you're more in the market for a netbook, consider this. The Slider is lighter and has better battery life than most netbooks. It's also "instant-on," and if you want a netbook that will do that you're looking at shelling out close to $1000. If you want a netbook that will do all that AND has a touchscreen, you're moving closer to $1500. And with wifi, the po ... tential for 3G tethering, and great office tools, this can (and for me, it has!) truly replace a netbook. You will never find a netbook anywhere near this price that offers so much value. Even the Transformer is heavier, and more expensive if you buy the keyboard dock (you get more battery life with the dock, but 8 hours of constant use really seems like plenty to me, because in practice I can get a couple days out of a charge). As a student, and a writer, this is a fantastic tool for me. I can even play pretty good games on it. Again, try doing that with your standard netbook - it won't go so well. The build quality is very sturdy, and if you're worried about the hinge, don't be. It's very solid. The keyboard is small, but it's well-built, so whether or not this is a deal breaker is an individual matter. I have no trouble with small keyboards, even though I have an RSI. But if you are someone who simply can't manage with small keyboards, then that may be the one and only reason I'd say to give this a pass. I find I can type surprisingly fast on the keyboard. On my desktop ergonimc keyboard, I type about 75wpm. On the Slider, I type about 65wpm, but I'm still getting used to it, so I might get a little faster in the coming weeks. Honeycomb works great, it's very fa ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: Satisfied once I had someone show me how
Item.Review:
Pros: App Availablity; Easy To Customize; Battery Life; Web Browsing; Screen; WiFi
Cons: Speaker Quality
I mainly use it for entertainment and games. I had one of my friends show me how to download things because It really doesn't come with any instructions. I type alot so it would be nice to have a shift on both sides of the board.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Use daily for internet searches and for the gps map. Keyboard makes it a lot easier to type emails. Perfect size and not too heavy. Battery last all day. Fast internet searches. Reasonable price for the added keyboard feature.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: A great tablet with few issues
Item.Review:
Being a Best Buy PC/HO specialist, I spend a lot of time around tablets and laptops. Around a week ago, I found myself at a crossroads: should I buy a full laptop or a tablet to supplement my computing needs when I am away from my desktop. Once I saw this tablet, the choice was clear.
The Pros: Keyboard - an attached full keyboard is obviously the big selling point on this tablet. It allows for a more "complete" computing experience on the tablet. The feel of the keyboard is nice, but admittedly a bit cramped. It interfaces well with the OS and makes productivity apps such as Polaris Office Suite (which is preinstalled on the tablet, by the way) a lot easier to work with than it would be with the software keyboard.
Screen - It's huge, has great resolution, and can hang wit ... h the big boys when it comes to brightness and clarity. I also found the touch screen functionality to be very responsive.
Ports - The tablet features a full size USB a Micro SD to allow for expandable storage. While I haven't personally used either yet (as I've had no need), I like the idea that I can expand my internal memory through them. As for the mini HDMI, it was nice being able to put the display on my 40" Samsung LED. How much use I will get out of this feature is debatable, but it definitely adds a "Wow!" factor to the tablet.
"Wow!" factor - This tablet oozes cool. Something about the shape of the screen and the white / chrome / black color scheme in the design just make it eyecatching. Crowds of people oohhed and ahhhed when I slid the screen up to reveal the keyboard underneath. It's definitely a head-turner and will make you the envy of your tech junkie friends.
Ice Cream Sandwich Upgrade - Asus has already announced over their Facebook page that this tablet will be upgradable to Android 4.0 (aka Ice Cream Sandwich), giving it a longer life span.
Cons:
Space bar and shift key - Being a fast typer, the unresponsivness of the space bar caused a few headaches. But after an adjustm ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Call me a throwback -- but I simply cannot use a device without a keyboard -- virtual keyboards just don't work if you are a touch typist of the old school. That having been said, the new tablet tecnology is great and I love it -- but the hassle of a seperate bluetooth keyboard is a pain. Ad in my familiarity with the Android platform from my phone and the Asus Slider is just a win/win for me. I find more and more that my computers are being ignored and I go to the Asus for everything -- it has replaced my desktop, travelling laptop and even my Kindle. Only drawbacks so far are that each time I turn it back on (instant on) I need to reconnect to my wireless -- but it takes a second and is not big deal -- and so far I haven't linked it to my bluetooth printer -- but I know I can do it. ... I need to try it with a mobile hotspot to replace my old Verizon card that is not supported with Android. Other than that -- perfect. Keyboard is easy to use and get to. Touch screen is appropriately sensitive. Connectivity seems great. And of course the Android apps keep on coming. I would recommend this to anyone who wants a keyboard with their tablet -- if you don't, then the extra weight is not worth it - but for me it is. One more plus - the full size USB card makes watching movies and inputting data a snap! Battery life has been excellent -- 2 or 3 days on a charge. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Overall the tablet is good with a decent price. Although I realize tablets don t have the same speed as laptops and desktops I was disappointed on how slow the response was to my commands. Occassionally I have to turn the screen or go back a page because the backspace stops working and this usually solves it. The browser that came with the tablet, although fast often crashes in the middle of a page. Other than that I ve had few problems with this tablet. The additional keyboard is a huge plus as it is now my primary computer. The tablet comes with plenty of storage for apps, music and pictures. The Nvidia Tegra games run very well on this tablet and the screen resolution is fantastic. I wouldn t reccomend this for students as the internet browsers are slow making online homework difficult ... and the need for investment in another word processor as Polaris Office, quite frankly, sucks when it comes to writing papers. If you just want a good tablet for on the go and have the money it is a good investment expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: App Availablity; Screen; Battery Life; WiFi; Web Browsing
Use it instead carrying my laptop. Love the keyboard. Easy to work with. It just cannot suport group emails. Can sent a quick doc. or email anytime. Just loving it.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Keyboard, USB and HDMI out
Cons: weight
If you are looking for a tablet which can practically replace a PC (90%), then this is it. It has a great look, keyboard, HDMI out and USB. It also comes with a micro SD card to bump up your memory option. It comes with loaded honeycomb (3.1) but upgradable to ICS (4.0). Battery life is around 9hours and around 7hours while playing video. Also, it comes with 3 ASUS propertory stuff - "Note", ASUS Webstorage and ASUS Remote control (PC). Webstorage has unlimited cloud storage free for one year and some $29/yr there on. Also has Polaris office and pdf pre installed. I could not ask for anything more!! happy reading!

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: These were purchased to replace meeting packets (Hard copies of agendas, background files, financial docs) when we purchased web-based meeting software. The combination tablet and keyboard has made it easy for folks unfamiliar with tablets, and it's very easy to transition between browsing and typing notes. The keyboard accommodates large hands and the keys are quiet enough that the microphones don't pick up the clicking sounds. We have a population of varying ages so having a choice of type size is beneficial. The only problem so far is configuring it so pdf docs can be read using the navigation pane.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Great balance between usability and convenience. Chunkier than average, but can still be used standing up on the bus or train. Has keyboard so great to type with. Much better than Transformer from Asus, as i can see the hinge between tablet and keyboard being damaged very easily. Mainly use when travelling. Much better than carrying around a separate keyboard. Much better than my netbook i use to take. Only con, speakers sound tinny, but thats a small price to pay.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Since I'm a writer, I wanted a small computer to take when I traveled and chose this Slider/Tablet. Its size, classy look, lightweight feel and slider keyboard seemed the perfect solution. What a disappointment to have difficulty pressing the space bar. My finger rested on the rim of the tablet making it difficult to get a space. I'm a typist who puts her hands on the keyboard the old-fashioned way, which means ten fingers across the middle row -- not the hunt-and-peck style, tapping out each letter. Consequently, the Slider just didn't perform well because the space bar is depressed and hard to access. With regret, I returned it, thankful BH Photo offered a full refund. Otherwise, I would have been stuck.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I use this as a laptop replacement used about 50% for work, thus the desire for an attached keyboard and not an on-screen keyboard or a remote keyboard. This fits the bill. I hesitated in buying this, as I was awaiting the Transformer Prime but in a flash of realization I decided the additional dollars for a keyboard dock was not worthwhile or functional for my purposes. The Slider operates well, it is fast and seamless so far. Would have given 5 stars if the speakers were more powerful, but downloading free Volume+ helped this a bit. No problem with battery life, I'm using it throughout the day as still have more than 40% battery left at day's end, so no need to carry the charger around.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: What else can I say. I really like It!
Item.Review: Excellent item. No regrets. I have an IPad 2 also. Both have their plus / minus features. This is not a "me too" tablet. It is the real deal. A tiny bit heavier but after I got a keyboard for the IPad 2, the weight factor didn't matter. The Slider screen image is very good and a little bigger.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Product is primarily used as a tablet. Screen resolution is great, crisp and bright. Touch is responsive. Typing on screen is right in line with other tablets; however, the slide out keyboard is pretty convenient to use and a nice added feature. It is slightly heavier than an iPad, but not by much.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Works great! When connected to internet terrific speed and more. The glass is as it says scratch-proof Gorilla glass. I find it an exceptiotional buy. I recommend this to all. Battery lasts very well at 8+ hrs. This being said am new to tablets and am disappointed at all to have the keyboard attached as well. I enjoy the mechanical keyboard to rest fingers on and yet don't mind the digital as well. Screen clarity is exceptionally awesome. I added a hotspot device by verizon and use it everrywhere w/stable connection. Thanks for a geart product I am sold on it. With keyboard opened it stands well for viewing also. Thanks, great product!

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
A Chritstmas present from Wife. What a gift, Overall Im satisfied and happy. good screen but the sound is not as loud. Performance is good with no lag. Did not receive a Tablet Case like the one on You Tube.
Manual it came with worthless, download the one from ASUS, gives you color and more info.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: My Tablet gets all the heads turning
Item.Review: I absolutely love this tablet. I greatly prefer android because a lot of the apps are free! It came pre-loaded with polaris office, which allows me to do my school work on it. The built in keyboard is a godsend! I was never any good at the finger pecking a touch screen keyboard demands. I also really love that there is a USB port. Like most Asus products I have seen, the volume isnt fantastic, but it meets my needs. People complained about its weight, and yes it is a bit heavier than most tablets, but only by about a pound. I got it in the mocha/brown which was backordered, but worth the wait; I love the color of it. This company was really great about getting the product to me on time and their website made it easy to track the orders.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Fluid controls and touch. Ease of use. Convenience with attached keyboard and expansion slot for more memory storage. Mini HDMI is nice too. Charging is quick about 2hours on sleep. Battery last till the end of the day, but have to charge every nite. Camera is abit on the downside. Overall a great value and quality.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I bought this for the form factor. The typing is very comfortable and fast. I almost always have the keyboard out when using, but the tablet form is handy when walking around. The screen is excellent (far brighter than my laptop). And then there's the battery life...Let me put it this way: I unplug it in the morning and plug it in at night. I have spent days using only this tablet and still had battery to spare at bedtime. I saw almost laptop replacement because Android does not yet match Windows for business functionality, but the built in Polaris Office is very useful. It is thicker and a little heavier than other tablets.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: Don't Hesitate to Buy this Tablet
Item.Review: I made a good decision in choosing the Slider. Asus has an excellent name and the tablet is quality throughout. For those tech reviewers who say it's heavy, it's only ounces heavier than the top selling Transformer and much lighter than a netbook. The feature that sold me on this model is the incorporated keyboard. It slides out of the tablet very easily and doubles as a tablet stand. The display is excellent, It's fast, plays all the games downloaded from the Market, and is so easy to operate. Asus thought of everything on this one. EXCEPT the sound. The volume up to max is still almost inaudible. However, I have an inexpensive tiny eyeball USB speaker that does a great job with blasting the sound. As a plus, I understand Asus, for 18 months from purchase, automatically updates the ... Android OS as new versions become available. I couldn't be happier. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: its a tablet & acts like a laptop
Item.Review:
Pros: built in keyboard that slides out
Cons: a little heavy for reading books
I Love it!!!!! its a tablet that has many features of a laptop built in. very fast and easy to use.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: Great tablet love the built in keyboard function
Item.Review:
Pros: keyboard built in and camera features
Cons: weight
First time tablet user and love the built in keyboard function. Dont care for the weight of it but its a trade off for having such a great tablet. Expandable with memory - overall great buy!

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Best choice for work and pleasure. The slide out keyboard makes it easy to create documents. The expandable memory options.... micro SD and usb ports are perfect for quick transitions from work to pleasure. Luv it !!!

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again
Item.Review:
Pros: Screen; WiFi; Battery Life
This tablet would have been much better had it contained a manual. I am not an IT person and had to hit & miss to find apps, sound, etc. Other than that I do like the tablet especially the feature with keyboard attached.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I'm in love with my new Asus tablet slider! The slide out keyboard is just amazing! It also has a USB, which is important to me. It is very easy to use!! I'd absolutely buy it again! Only thing that is a con to me is that it wont let me watch TV on hulu!

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Used for travel and a couple of hours a day around the house. The USB and HDMI ports and micro SD card slot are big plusses. Really like having the keyboard, though find that the shift button placement takes getting used to. Screen is bright with good colors and resolution. Very compact. Clever design and good looking. Very convenient to flip the screen up and still use the touchscreen when in lap or on table. Sound is mono, but ok. Good video for skype video calls. Lighter than a netbook.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: all of the ports and sd slot, built in keyboard, gorilla glass, the list goes on and on!
Cons: The ONLY complaint i have is there are not enough cases available in the stores. I got one for a regular 10 inch tablet
I absolutely love this tablet. I spent a few months researching different tablets and ipads. I was waiting on the Transformer Prime but ran out of time so I decided on this one and I am so glad I did! I use the touch screen most of the time, but when I go to class I just slide up the screen for my keyboard and start typing. Everyone that sees and uses mine says they want one. The keys are very easy to type on and I don't have to carry a keyboard or cords with me. I have a usb port for my wireless mouse or flash drive. The screen is gorilla glass and a very go ... od picture. I love this thing!!! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I ordered the asus slider tablet and its all I expected & more. Its compact & I love the hidden keyboard. The touchscreen is sensitive and fast. Very accurate. My customer service from B&H was superb! They called right after I ordered to assure my purchase & I received in like 3 days. I like that I can use an SD card and the convenience of the charger being able to break down. Camera quality is great as well. Definitely a great buy!

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Web Browsing; Operating System; Battery Life; WiFi; Easy To Customize; Screen; App Availablity
I bought this for my teenage daughter who will be attending colleg this fall. She uses this tablet for all of her school work in addition to playing games, watching movies, surfing the net, playing music, email and more. This has become her new best friend. She also loves the ability to use the camera from either side of the tablet and the compact, hidden keyboard is certainly a bonus. There is no need to purchase an additional keyboard. The speakers are great in close range, but the volume is not so good for larger spaces. However, plug-in some decent speakers and you are set. There are a lot of apps on this tablet that even the most popular ipad doesn't have.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: This is a terrific tablet. Best thing is that it's so easy to use and figure out (and I'm usually a slow tech learner). So far it does everything I need and more. Way easier than my desktop or phone to learn. Only thing I've not yet figured out is how to send stuff to my wireless printer.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: After lots of research, I decided on this tablet and I'm very happy I did. I'm a personal trainer and use(d) Excel spreadsheets for my clients workouts and schedules. I was worried about the Polaris Office suite not being compatible, but it's been a nearly seamless transition. I LOVE the keyboard and use it even as I'm training a client. I have yet to use the internet while I'm working with a client but switch back & forth between clients. I went to Verizon and got a 4Glte MiFi for about $80 - it's supposed to provide 4G speed when I'm in 4G coverage and 3G when that's all that's available. I pay $50 per month for 5 gigs which is a little more than I need and want to pay, but that's the low end of what Verizon offered so I'll make it work. I have nothing bad to say about this tablet f ... or now - 'had it for a couple of weeks now. B & H Photo was great, fast service & delivery. Right now, it's all good, no, it's great! I have friends with the Ipad 2 and they are jealous. More info later. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: Excellent Tablet and a built in keyboard to boot
Item.Review:
Pros: Built in keyboard and USB
Cons: nothing after 1 month.
I bought it for my wife for Christmas as her laptop is approaching 6 years old and could go bust any day now. She mainly uses the tablet for email, the web and storing and sharing pictures. All personal reviews I read were raving about the Asus Slider, except consumer reports. Consumer reports had very good or excellent for everything except portability. They are correct that extra 0.7lbs making it 2 lbs instead of 1.3lbs makes it too heavy to travel with!! haha. I had to laugh when I read that, and immediately purchased it being that all of the other categories rated it excellent or very good. She's had it for a month now and I've only seen her old laptop used once for iTunes. Unless I have not stumbled across a wa ... y to use iTunes on the Android software, that is the only drawback I see to the tablet (or any non- Apple tablet for that matter).
The built in keyboard is excellent and allows you to see the entire screen while typing without having to purchase or carry a keyboard in addition to the tablet. The USB 2.0 is also an excellent addition allowing easy data transfer and storage should you fill up the memory. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I was torn between buying this tablet or a laptop for grad school. I ended up going with this and i am happy i did. It works great with the keyboard, it allows me to type of study guides or use the android market to find a flash card app which is a big help. its great for leisure too with all the games you can download for free along with all the apps. Its pretty quick and responsive, boots up in jiffy. battery life is pretty fair, lasts the whole day but im not on it constantly during that time. the only thing i can say that is negative about this is its probably not a total replacement for a laptop/desktop. but then again it is a tablet, so to say that it was designed to be a laptop isn't necessarily fair.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: The best of all worlds - ASUS Slider NetTablet
Item.Review:
Pros: Gives me mobile light weigh conductivity with a great touch screen and keyboard
Cons: Need a live Spell check program. No true hardware issues.
I studied the market and web chat for months. Could not get hands on experience (no store had the Slider) but knew I wanted a connected keyboard to a tablet for stability and ability to type during commuting (tight areas). I am 54 and all under 30 said who needs a keyboard. Well when I have them use it as a tablet they say the touch and color screen are smooth and great. Yes, it is an extra pound to handle but when I pop the back and slide out the keyboard everybody says that is so cool. I use MailDroid for my e-mail because is has spell check which I so need. Browser speed is very good. I do not play games. Keyboard is good, ke ... ys a bit spongy and you need to hit the space bar firmly or in the middle. Start up is quick, battery life not an issue (remember no gaming) What I need is for Polaris the Word program is to have a built in spell check, hoping Ice Cream Sandwich gives me some type of relief on spell check AND cut and pasting e-mails and web pages. One other issue is sending e-mails with attachments, they sometimes get hung up and I do not know why. It gives me mobile light weigh conductivity with a great touch, large screen and computer type features. Over all I love it!! Michael expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I bougt 6 of these for use by therapists for doing documentation. They are delighted. The tablet interfaces perfectly with our server - we had to download an app but once we figured that out it was easy. The keyboard is great. I wouldn't be surprised if more manufacturers come out with slide out keyboads on tablets.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast; Powerful; Easy To Setup; Easy To Use
Do not know about the 3G Network. Has camera,and sure you can skype. Can get NetFlix. Has GPS, but have not used yet. Best in all Tablets. Asus makes the best internal parts on PC's today...including their tablets. Please do not count MAC's as a PC.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I bought this tablet for my wife. I researched the price and Overstock had the best price. We like it because it is exactly like using her Droid phone. This tablet is awesome.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: Hands down best Android tablet available
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything is great about this tablet
Cons: The sound is a little quiet but its what is expected of a tablet
The Asus Slider is hands down the BEST tablet available on the market today. I purchased the Toshiba Thrive and messed around with it for a couple days and didnt care for it very much. I was going to exchange it for the Asus Transformer while researching the Transformer I came across the Slider. So the next day I went to Best Buy and returned the Thirve and ordered the Slider. It took longer then expected to receive the tablet via UPS and my only complaint is I asked when I purchased the tablet if they could give me signature confirmation the girl said that is already included. Well the day that the tablet was arriving I had to work so I thought I would just have ... to pick it up at UPS boy was I wrong It was just hanging out on my porch and I was very upset about this. With all this being said I should probably get to the review.
I recommend this tablet to everyone if you are considering getting a tablet put this one on your list. The full key board is a god send. I can not stand typing on a touch screen keyboard. A lot of people have been bad mouthing this tablet saying it is too heavy because of the keyboard. Which is by no means true. It is not very heave at all. You will not notice much of a difference in weight. What people should be saying is all other pads are too light because they don't have a key board. The keyboard takes a little getting used to but having your full screen for viewing while using the keyboard makes up for the little extra weight and smaller keyboard.
The screen is Gorilla glass I haven't done to much research on the benefit of gorilla glass but I hope its better then most screens.
The tablet has a USB port and a mini HDMI port which is great for hooking to your TV, I watched a couple shows on Hulu sound and video were perfect. It also his Micro SD, I purchased the 16 GB tablet and a 32 GB Micro SD card for $520.00 instead of getting the 32 GB tablet for $580
This tablet is so easy to use my dad can use it and he has not tech savvy at al ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: Tablet with built in keyboard is the way to go.
Item.Review:
Pros: Built in keyboard, external ports
Cons: Speaker, but I have a hearing loss.
If you even think that you might need a keyboard with your tablet this is the only way to go. Why buy a tablet and a keyboard? The keyboard lays under the tablet out of the way when you don't need it, but it is always there. So why have two seperate items to do the samething? All the nessary ports like micro SD, HDMI out, and USB are there to.
It was easy to setup and get the latest updates. Everything that I tried with it worked very well including Netflix. This was a gift for my wife but I might have to get one for myself. I like it.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything
Cons: Nothing
Forget the IPad 2 this is the only way to go. This tablet is so easy to use. What I love about android is once I set up my Eee Pad Slider it automatically installed all the apps I have on my Droid X. Polaris office works great with Microsoft office. If you buy this tablet you won't be sorry. It is also very fast and streamlined. Just waiting for Ice Cream Sandwich OS now (Android 4.0)

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: Love it, love it , love it
Item.Review:
Pros: attached slide keyboard
Cons: on button must be held for several seconds.
Keyboard works great and the battery lasts!
Never had a smart phone so it took me a bit to get use to it. For what I need it comes with everything - just turn it on, set your personal settings, and go! SD card slot, USB ports, front and back camera..... Absolutely fantastic! Never bought a tablet before because I have too much typing to do to use a touch screen keyboard.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: Love it, Love it, Love it.
Item.Review:
It is a blast to show this off. "Oh, is that a tablet?" they start off with, showing mild interest. "Ah, yes, but check this--" [pull out keyboard] and every time, it gets gasps and the enthusiasm level skyrockets. The GeekSquader at Best Buy even did a little jig and declared he wanted one, too.
The weight is reasonable. Honeycomb rocks. Comes pre-loaded with useful apps (Polaris has done the word processing tasks I need nicely). The keyboard is small yet manageable. (I do miss having a "del" key.) 16GB has been more than adequate so far, and with the microSD card I don't foresee any issues. I get 9 hours on one charge. Sound isn't great but geez, so what? Love having the USB port. Love being able to read my ebooks and browse on it at night. There are times I kinda wish I'd gotten ... a "real" laptop but the fun factor always outweighs the regret factor. My kids love it, too, and with the Gorilla Glass I'm not too scared letting them use it. (caveat: be careful about the apps out there, lots of un-kid-safe stuff floating around)
I've never paid full price for an electronic device in my life - until now, and I'd do it again. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Size, Keyboard, Touch Screen, and Polaris Office
Cons: Nothing but some will say weight but like i said in review dont worry about it your getting a great trade off.
This tablet is awesome its does everything you could want it to do. The key board is an awesome feature that way if you have to do a lot of typing bam you can just slide it up and theres the key board and not have to type it all out on the touch screen. The usb port is awesome feature to have havent used it yet but I have a feeling its going to come in handy in the long run. The touch screen is really responsive and the tablet is just fast overall. The last thing about the tablet people were concerned about is the weight. The weight is not an issue I dont really notice it and it comes with an awesome trade ... off a built in keyboard who couldn't live with a little more weight for that trade off. If your looking for a tablet really consider this one I persoally think its better than the ipad (i have used my sister's didn't really like it) and the polaris office that is already installed makes it great for business or school. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: i think this tablet is great because it is combined with a computer and a tablet and i thought it woud cost way more than that like $ but i think u should keep up the good work because this is a really good tablet

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I love this product. I wanted something small with a pull out keyboard that I could use to take notes with at meetings and workshops, etc. which this has. I also wanted to be able to check my email at hotels and motels and also when I am at a workshop which this does. A bonus for me that I did not realize this tablet had was a Kindle reader which I absolutely love and have downloaded many books. All my friends who have seen me with this have exclaimed that they want one too and want to know where I got it. The only complaint I have is exactly the same as one I read beore I purchased this and that is that there are no directions with it, not even a help menu which was very frustrating to me and caused me to almost send it back....but I kept at it and finally figured out how the var ... ious programs work. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: WiFi; App Availablity; Operating System; Battery Life
Cons: Difficult To Customize; Speaker Quality
Great replacement for my laptop, I'll have to learn about the operating system. ASUS needs to include an operators manual.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: I have long fingernails and the touch keyboard is hard to use, I love that it have a real keyboard that slides
Cons: havent found anything that is not great
After looking at a lot of tablets I choose this one because of the sliding keyboard. I have long nails and need a real keyboard to type on, yet if I am not typing the keyboard slides closed and you are back to a tablet.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Just bought this and so far I love it! Just takes some getting used to if its your frst android device. Note this does not come with an instruction manual- need to go on youtube and watch some videos on how to use it efficintly. Keyboard is fantastic. The fact that this device has hdmi, micro sd, and usb ports is great.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Excellent product, exactly what I was looking for. I purchased this for my wife, and she is so much happier having a keyboard than trying to type on the screen. One issue ... the rubberish non-skid bottom picks up marks and does not seem to be able to be cleaned? Anyone know how to clean this surface without damaging the material?

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Customize; Web Browsing; WiFi; App Availablity; Battery Life; Operating System; Screen
I was a little disappointed I could not get HBO go, but other than that it a large selection of free apps. The slide out keyboard is awesome.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Most of the things about this tablet are great. I almost did not purchase it because one review I read said there were no operational instructions with it beyond turning it on, etc., and I knew that would make it difficult and frustrating to me, which it did. And the reviewer was correct...I had to figure it out myself. There are a few things about it I still can't figure out but the things I use it for meets my needs and the reason why I wanted it. I am especially happy that it also includes a Kindle on it so that I can download e-books through [@]. This feature is indeed a plus factor. Also the Polaris Office was another reason why I purchased this machine and the note pad for note taking at conferences, etc.I love the slider keyboard and the only thing that I don't like is that ... I cannot find a delete key anywhere on it and so have no way to delete a letter or typing error(s) like on a normal keyboard. My biggest disappointment about this tablet is that there is no overall help menu anywhere on it, and if there is I sure have not found it. I would think that all computers would have a help menu so you can read about and understand everything there is to know about the machine you purchased. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Customize; App Availablity; Battery Life; Web Browsing; Operating System; Screen; WiFi
Cons: Heavier than avg tablet; Bulky slider-keyboard
Great tablet and love the option of using slider keyboard instead of buying a separate keyboard for the tablet. Downfall: Not many protective cases out there made especially for the tablet.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I absolutely love my tablet! I call it my hub. I work full-time and do a lot of paper work plus have a crazy work schedule and take classes--this lets me do everything on the go or at home. I really like the keyboard:) I couldn't be happier with my purchase!

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I purchase this product over the weekend and it came really fast. The item looks like it's been used a thousand times and when I tried the sound it was simply horrible. I have been a customer of this company for at least 7 years and have had other issues with their products but returning can be a hassle so I have kept a few but this time I am returning for a full refund I wish they would refund me the returning shipment I am going to have to pay. Asus slider would be a good product for me if only it was new and the sound was great but it's not the case. I was very disappointed with Overstock with this one. Do not buy it. Now I am not buying electronics from overstock ever again. ...

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: faster than most
Cons: I wish there was a better browser.
If there was a really good browser, this would be a great device. It is noticable larger and heavier than tablets without a keyboard. But, on balance, the keyboard is probably worth it.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: WiFi; Easy To Customize; I think it's cool; Battery Life; It has a cool keypad; It's cheaper than IPAD; App Availablity; Web Browsing; Operating System; Screen
Cons: Have not found one yet
Product is great.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: DOES NOT SUPPORT USB 2.0 EXTERNAL HARDRIVES
Item.Review: SLIDER DOES NOT SUPPORT USB 2.0 EXTERNAL HARDRIVES. DOES NOT PROVIDE ENOUGH POWER THROUGH THE PORT TO POWER UP THE DRIVE. I RETURNED THE UNIT AND BOUGHT A THRIVE WHICH MY EXTERNAL USB HD WORKS ON.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: ASUS - LITTLE TO NO RESPONSE OR CUSTOMER SUPPORT
Item.Review:
Pros: SLIDER KEYBOARD
Cons: NO CUSTOMERSERVICE, TABLET FREEZES OFTEN
I PURCHASED THE ASUS SLIDER FOR ITS KEYBOARD BENEFITS IN THE TABLET. THE TABLES USB WAS DEFECTIVE. I EMAILED SUPPORT TO DETERMINE IF A DRIVER NEEDED TO BE DOWNOADED. EMAIL ASSIGNED A CASE NUMBER AND ADVISE I WOULD RECEIVE A REPLY WITHIN 24 TO 48 HOURS. THAT WAS A NEGATIVE, BUT MORE OF A NEGATIVE WAS I NEVER RECEIVED A RESPONES. I CALLED SUPPORT, BUT THE PERSON I SPOKE TO WAS CLUELESS. I CALLED ASUS HEADQUARTERS IN FREMENT CALIFORNIA AND WAS STONEWALLED. I FINALLY GOT TO A SUPPORT PERSON WHO ADVIS ME TO EXCHANGE THE UNIT. MY SECOND DISAPOINTMENT, WASS THE ASUS SLIDER FREEZES OFTEN AND HAS TO BE REBOOTED. THIS IS WHEN I DISCOVERED THE EXTRA BUTTON ON THE SIDE OF THE UNIT TO REBOOT THE SYSTEM WITH A WARNING ON ... THE SCREEN THAT YOU WILL LOOSE YOUR DATA. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: App Availablity; Screen; Easy To Customize; WiFi; Operating System
Cons: Button Configuration
If you're looking for a quality tablet, that's easy to use and have everything you need, look no further. The dual core processor is faster then you think! With the attached keyboard, you don't have to worry where to store a $160 add-on! Like you, I was new to the whole tablet lifestyle, but this is everything I had hoped for and more. The one problem I did have was the power button stopped working after a week, but took it back for a complete exchange.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I finally got the Android tablet with a slideout keyboard that I wanted. Everything works great, and there is one added benefit. Asus made it so that the screen props up when you slide out the keyboard. This makes it so much more comfortable than Ipads and other Android tablets.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: the way i see it, this product have the answer to all my needs during the day outside office and home (internet, calender, pictueres & social network). i realy cant find any bad things to say about it.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: WiFi; Easy To Customize; Screen; Battery Life; Operating System; Web Browsing; App Availablity
Cons: Speaker Quality
I use it for browsing the internet, checking email, watching movies, and games. This tablet works great all around. I love it.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I purchased two of these. One is mine, for my business uses. The other is for my partner for her schooling needs, and eventually business requirements. They are so light and portable. The keyboard comes in so handy, especially if you are typing long documents. It comes with Polaris Office, which is compatible with Microsoft-if need be. I was worried the keyboard would add more bulk, but there isn t much of a difference at all. These are very sturdy tablets. We ve had them a month and I can t see going back to a laptop!

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: What a great tablet! I have been reluctant to get a tablet because I couldn't imagine not having a physical keyboard. The Asus slider does it all! I love the portability, the brilliant screen, the fast response time, and the ability to use a mouse or stylus, the usb port, everything about it. The only criticism I have is there are no instructions, so I am experimenting to find out what all it does, and how.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Web Browsing; Is super fast; App Availablity; Screen; Web Browsing is Great; Great battery life; WiFi
Cons: Speaker Quality
I love using the Asus because it's smaller than most laptops, it's not bulky and I can use it virtually anywhere, traveling, shopping, or working it's great.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again and again
Item.Review:
Pros: Operating System; Screen; WiFi; App Availablity; Web Browsing; Battery Life; Easy To Customize
Very nice product for my wife who is an educator and has used the device for entertainment as well.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Battery Life; App Availablity
Cons: Difficult To Customize; Speaker Quality
For Preaching I can get my sermon from Microsoft 2010 I can film a lot of stuff moving takt pic don't have the App the I pad have thats it pretty much.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: For my wife, almost caused a divorce
Item.Review:
Pros: Portability; App Availablity; WiFi; For reading books
Cons: Takes you to buy books; Speaker Quality
She needs more instruction and the store is eager to help. We have not been able to take advantage of this help. We should have more time in the future.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Operating System; App Availablity; Easy To Customize; Web Browsing; Battery Life; Screen
Cons: Button Configuration
I felt like an idiot the first day, so I decided to just start seeing what I could do with this thing. I had to forget what I knew from my laptop and start over, but it is a welcome change. This is much easier to pack up for class and the keyboard beats punching glass keys. A little heavier than most tablets, but you have everything you need when you lift up the screen.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: This is the best Tab on the market to me
Item.Review: I use this for everything,I have been researching tabs for about 6months. when I read about this one I was impressed I find everything great about it. There were people complaining about the keypad but I haven't had any problems with slowness at all.I truey want people to know that this tab is the BOMB!I purchased this from B&H ,This was the first time I had ever purchased anything from them they were outstanding.I couldn't find the slider in any stores so I had to go completely on my research and some of the things people from different sites were saying; Thats why I'm taking the time to tell my story about the tablet.It is fast, the battery last 8hours,was able to get on line right away,there are alot of apps to choose from and some talk about the weight of the tab it is not weighty ... at all its a comfortable weight for whats in it,the keypad. I hope this helps alittle expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Love this tablet. Did some research, loked at a few different tablets and picked the Asus Slider. Really love the attached keyboard. Was a major selling point for me.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I have wanted a tablet for a number of years but have been reluctant to purchase the #1 iPad due to costs and restrictive applications that can run on it. After viewing Kindles and various book readers I realized that wouldn't do for me as I use all the office software on my PC from home. This tool is less costly than an iPad and there is a large array of apps available for the business person and for the gamer. It's not for the dedicated gamer but for someone who travels a lot and needs something to pass time in airports it's great. With cloud technology I can take all my files from my home pc/work pc with me on the road and only carry a very lightweight device. It connects through my phone to the internet and I can do all my emails through it on the road. Did I mention that even t ... he 32MB version is less than the iPad. B&H delivered faster than they originally said and I was very grateful to have it early without extra charges for delivery. Great machine and great company to purchase from. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Almost everything! Really love the keyboard & Android OS
Cons: Wish it had better speakers and able to install printer
I love my Asus Slider! I use it for school & for my 3 yr old to use learning apps. The only thing I have a problem with is not being about to set up a printer on it. If anyone knows how, please drop me a line! The keyboard has been great, no problems there. The speakers work best when you have the keyboard out but they're not the greatest. It's not too heavy and way better camera then any other tablet I have used.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I purchased this tablet for my daughter and she is very pleased with it. Having a keyboard is a plus for her and the speed of the processor has been great. She has no complaints.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I LOVE this tablet! I keep it in the living room and use it to look up everything! I use it for shopping on lots of websites. When we need information about movies, or any subject imaginable, Slider is there. I play games, look up entertainment venues, and routes to get there. This is way faster than my 2-year old netbook. My e-mails are displayed right on my desktop. Believe i or not, the keyboard with no wristrest is easier for me to use than the netbook one with the wristrest (I hit wrong keys all the time and throw myself out of emails I'm composing, and my husband has the same problem). I love the display which is very clear and colorful. Some people don't like the glossy finish of the screen (gorilla glass), but to me, that makes the display clear and sharp (like the difference betw ... een glossy and matte finish photographs). Sure you can see fingerprints easily, but only when the bright sceen is not on. Also, I wear glasses and always have number of microfiber cloths that clean the glass easily. I have been considering buying a stylus for the screen not so much for the fingerprints but to be able select small choices easier on the touch screen. My brother-in-law has a Transformer but with the keyboard docking station it cost more than my Slider; plus it's heavier and I wanted a keyboard, but not quite as cumbersome as my netbook. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Built in keyboard
Cons: Nothing
Bought this for my son to replace his broken laptop. This is a very nice tablet. Clear screen, nice response, and the built in keyboard is one of a kind. Unfortunately, I had to return it and wound up getting him another laptop. I don't think he was ready to go soley tablet only. I still think if you really can use the keyboard feature, this is the best tablet on the market. The built in USB ports are huge, Ipad can't compete!!

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I've been searching for the ideal tablet for over a year now and a friend recommended I check this one out. Needless to say, it met all my criteria - USB port, ability to use memory card for storage/expansion, AND A KEYBOARD! I've tried the iPad and it just doesn't come close to this tablet ... if I wanted to purchase a wireless MAC keyboard and wireless external hard drive and carry all that around, I'd just use a laptop. So far I have been using the Asus tablet for a few weeks and have no complaints - yes, its picture quality is lacking (5 megapixels); however, if I want to take photos I will be using my camera not my tablet. So I give it a full 5 stars!

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: A great tablet - easy to use w/ amazing features!
Item.Review:
Pros: Great picture, rear & front facing cameras, ease of use
Cons: Could have a little better speakers, not very loud but plug it into our sound system if need to!
We love this tablet and it's ease of use. I purchased this tablet for my other half for Christmas and had searched and searched through reviews when I found this one. He likes having a keyboard and that was his only hold back from actually getting a tablet so when I ran across this one and saw all of the great reviews I knew I had found it! Love that it is Droid based and we can enjoy all of our favorite apps on it and that we are able to edit and work on our Microsoft word and excel files on it also.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Had it a week and the power supply failed (the one that plugs into the wall). Still haven't RMA'd. The screen is bright, nice to use. Product support is all but non-existant, not to mention very slow. It comes with some very good utilities. Normal access to android market.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Capable of doing multiple things while still compact in size
It is great for using at school taking notes in class and doing lab write ups allowing me to email them directly from class room to professor. Also great for games and to use as my e reader.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
When I was searching for a tablet I knew I was going to buy one with Android since I have used Apple products in the past and hate how you have to fit everything into their "box." I did a ton of research and really liked the reviews I saw for the Asus Slider, but really liked the fact that it came with the keyboard attached (lack of keyboard was one of my hesitations about purchasing a tablet).
I have now had the Asus Slider for two weeks and I could not be happier! This thing is smooth as heck, extremely functional/customizable, and comes with some really cool apps (i.e. My Cloud, MyNet, App Backup, File Manager, etc.). Another perk of this tablet is the fact that you don't need a case/cover to tilt the view for comfort...all you do is slide the keyboard out, place on your lap, and ... you are good to go.
One last hesitation I had was around the new Android OS Ice Cream Sandwich (ICS), and thought maybe I should wait to see if Asus came out with a new Slider that had ICS preloaded. After some research I found out that Asus was planning on offering an upgrade to all its Eee tablets (and now see on their website that an ICS upgrade is available with Adobe Flash support), so there went that concern.
If you are looking for a fun yet extremely functional tablet you should look no further. This thing is really sweet and I highly recommend it to anyone! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: has lots of options
Cons: a litle slow in some browsing sessions
I was debating between this one and the IPAD2. this tablet has features which are included such as usb port, keyboard (choice to either use touch pad or slider keyboard)..it is fast. I like the usb port to use for wireless mouse and other equipment. There is some delay in some of the browsing but that may be more my user error than the tablet. It is rated very well (google it) and is coming up better than IPAD2. It is a little heavier due to the slider keyboard but not by much.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: I'm very happy with the tablet, fast and with a good touch. The keyboard make it a little heavier and thicker than other tablets but for my use i would never give the integrated keyboard up.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
This tablet does everything I had hoped it would do. Much easier to carry around than my laptop and the USB ports were important. I have no complaints at all about the keyboard - it's what I expected in a product of this size. And it is much faster and more accurate than the touch screen keyboard.
I was concerned that the weight would be an issue, but after using it nearly a month, I am satisfied. Performance is excellent. One little nitpick is the location of the power/wake-up button. It is between the volume rocker and a chrome trim piece and hard to locate by touch - I actually have to look at it to get the right button. But you can also turn it on by opening the keyboard about 1/2 inch.
If you want a tablet, but need a real keyboard, this is the product.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Customize; WiFi; App Availablity; Battery Life; Web Browsing; Operating System; Screen
Cons: None
A friend of mine got an iPad2 and let me play around with it, so I got addicted and had to go shop around for my own. Having two kids (4 and 2) that LOVE playing on mine and my wife's touch screen android phones, I had to find something that the whole family could use. I went and played with all of the displays and fell in love with the ASUS transformer. The same weekend, the Slider was released and advertised in hhgregg's weekly ad. I went, saw, touched, and purchased the same day. I have not looked back and my kids have never been so entertained. I would highly recommend this for home entertainment/web browsing/or anything android related. Eight thumbs up from thi ... s family!!! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: App Availablity; Web Browsing; Operating System; WiFi; Screen; Easy To Customize; Battery Life
GREAT PRICE

amazing product a little heavy because of the key pad

Item.Review:

we use it for all our social needs. fits perfect.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Operating System; WiFi; Keyboard; Screen; Easy To Customize; App Availablity; Web Browsing; Battery Life
Great table

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: Screen
Cons: Difficult To Customize
The screen freeze up all the time , and shake for no reason ..

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review:
Pros: easy to use
Cons: nothing
Love everything about the eepad slider. Love the keypad - just like a mini laptop. Wish more instructions came with it though.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White

the wireless does not pick up to good

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: great,fast,sleek. wish could get icsupdate asap.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.Review: Fast and stylish.

Item.Item: ASUS Eee Pad Slider SL101 16 GB - White
Item.ReviewTitle: Got this for a new project. Works great
